import React from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Checkoutsteps from '../../components/Checkoutsteps/Checkoutsteps'; import classes from './Placeorderscreen.module.css'; const Placeorderscreen=(props)=>{ const shippinginfo=useSelector((state)=>state.addtocart); const {cartitems,shippingaddress,paymentmethod}=shippinginfo; const signininfo=useSelector((state)=>state.signin); const {user}=signininfo; if(Object.keys(user).length==0){ props.history.push('/signin'); } if(Object.keys(shippingaddress).length==0){ props.history.push('/Shipping'); } let subquantity=0; let subprice=0; let subproductprice=0; let subtotal=0; let totalquantity=0; return(
    {cartitems.map((item)=>( (subprice=item.price, subquantity=item.quantity, subproductprice=subquantity*subprice, subtotal=subtotal+subproductprice, totalquantity=totalquantity+subquantity ),

  • {item.name}

    {item.quantity} X Rs {item.price} = Rs {item.quantity*item.price}
    • ))}

Order Summary

Items

Shipping

Order Total

) } export default Placeorderscreen;
